name: Wrestling Superstars Pro - Real Gangster Fight in
name_original: Wrestling Superstars Pro - Real Gangster Fight in
description:
**NO ADS in this pro version**

The reign of criminals and thugs will end when the wrestler champions and monster superhero will come to rescue the people of Miami city in a new superhero escape. The people are living under the shadow of fear so play as a wrestling superstar and incredible superhero to overcome the darkness of terror fearlessly.
Kill boredom with Wrestling Superstars-Real Gangster Fight free 3D action survival game, start your journey of superhero adventure as a street wrestling fighter and and take down the current champions and flying monsters of wrestling mania in hero escape. When it comes to playing some real wrestling arena battle game anyone would prefer a game where one can fight people like a smashing monster and bash the people out of his way. The clash of monsters with villains, gangsters and terrorist is the most excited thing in this game.
Enter the clash of monsters like a fearless wrestling superstar mafia hero and kill the criminals and street fighters by showing up fighting and smashing skills in this exclusive survival escape mission. Terrorists have been threatening the locals of Miami City even in presence of super soldier who is also called the tree of savior. Robbery and murder is common now-a-days due to these jail breakout monsters and you have to show these gangster villains that you are a real battle hero. Fight the gangsters on the streets of Miami to stop crimes and make city a place for everyone. Character jam the monster hero in the Forbidden City till the last villain standing. Fight criminals like a fearless fighter and prove that you are a city fighter. You are the last hope of people for city survival against evil defenders. Stealth killing and many other interesting stages like mission of heroes are waiting for you and smashing heroes in this monster city. You are the fittest street fighter gate of heroes having skills of martial arts, superhero fighters and heavy weight wrestling. Now, you have to crush incredible monsters in the finals fight street combat. In this battle arena you must enter with a boom and increase the number of deadheads. Team up with your clan mates in this street fatal fight to kill all the jail break snipers.
